description:
After collapsing from malnourishment, Hiroki has been taken to hospital. While making preparations to leave, he feels a breeze blowing up from below him. However, things that should be swaying in that breeze appear stationary when he looks in a mirror. Reminded of the day Tsukasa was nearly crushed, Hiroki makes his way down into the subterranean depths of the hospital.
Source: Amazon
